text: The 2015 IIHF Challenge Cup of Asia became the 8th IIHF Challenge Cup of Asia, an annual international ice hockey tournament held by the International Ice Hockey Federation (IIHF). It took place between 14 and 19 March 2015 in Taipei City, Chinese Taipei. ==Top Division== Participants Team 2014 Results Host, Won gold medal in 2014 Won silver medal in 2014 Won bronze medal in 2014 4th place in 2014 Winner of Division I in 2014 ===Preliminary round=== Team 1 4 4 0 0 0 52 6 +46 12 2 4 3 0 0 1 22 8 +14 9 3 4 2 0 0 2 17 17 0 6 4 4 1 0 0 3 8 21 −13 3 5 4 0 0 0 4 2 49 −47 0 Won gold medal Won silver medal Won bronze medal Relegated to Division I 2016 ==Division I== The Division I competition will played between 18 and 25 April 2015 in Kuwait City, Kuwait. Participants Team 2014 Results Host, 6th in Top Division in 2014 2nd in Division I in 2014 3rd in Division I in 2014 4th in Division I in 2014 Did not participate in 2014 No previous participation ===Preliminary round=== Team 1 5 5 0 0 0 30 8 +22 15 2 5 4 0 0 1 36 11 +25 12 3 5 3 0 0 2 27 22 +5 9 4 5 0 2 0 3 20 36 −16 4 5 5 1 0 1 4 29 23 +6 4 6 5 0 0 1 4 12 54 −42 1 Promoted to Top Division 2016 ==References== ==Other websites== *International Ice Hockey Federation IIHF Challenge Cup of Asia Category:2015 in Asia Category:2010s in Taiwan Category:March 2015 events Category:Sport in Taiwan
title: 2015 IIHF Challenge Cup of Asia
